name: elrab3
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), w1))

stmt.origin: baib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), w1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), w1))
-| wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.)
